description: Gets a key policy attached to the specified KMS key. Cross-account use: No. You cannot perform this operation on a KMS key in a different Amazon Web Services account. Required permissions: kms:GetKeyPolicy (key policy) Related operations: PutKeyPolicy. Eventual consistency: The KMS API follows an eventual consistency model. For more information, see KMS eventual consistency.

parameters.name: KeyId
parameters.description: Gets the key policy for the specified KMS key. Specify the key ID or key ARN of the KMS key. For example: Key ID: 1234abcd-12ab-34cd-56ef-1234567890ab Key ARN: arn:aws:kms:us-east-2:111122223333:key/1234abcd-12ab-34cd-56ef-1234567890ab To get the key ID and key ARN for a KMS key, use  ListKeys or  DescribeKey.

nested_items.name: Policy
nested_items.description: A key policy document in JSON format.

nested_items.name: PolicyName
nested_items.description: The name of the key policy. The only valid value is default.
